name: Definitely Not Date Night
description:
Help Bert & Berta make it to their date!

This game wasn't created for Brackeys Game Jam #2. 

This is a mod of Brackeys' Date Night with improved controls.

Controls:

  • Bert (Blue): Arrow Keys
  • Berta (Pink): WASD

Cheat Keys:

  • N: Next Level
  • R: Restart Level

Tools Used:

  • Brackeys' Date Night Source Code
  • Jonas Tyroller's Platformer Source Code

Note: This game was created to improve the controls of the original game.

Credits to Brackeys and Jonas Tyroller for their source codes, without them this game wouldn't be made.

And lastly, this game is dedicated to Brackeys for the three years of teaching me when I'm starting on my game development journey.
